alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 9:03PM MST until January 08 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Eagar-Springerville and Saint Johns. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to midnight MST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow and reduced visibility. 50 mph wind gusts may also bring down tree branches * SNOW TABLES...Snow forecast from 11 AM Sunday to midnight Monday: Eagar-Sprgrvlle 1 to 3 inches Saint Johns 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If travel is essential, allow for extra drive time and use caution. For the latest road conditions and closures...call the ADOT freeway management system at 1 888 411 7623 or visit their web site at www.az511.com. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
